ComicInfo.Summary: Adama and Starbuck return to Galactica with the early model Cylons. While on Galactica the Cylons prevent an assassination attempt on President Roslin and a separate attempt on Colonel Tigh. One older generation Cylon detects that Sharon is a Cylon and, determining that she is a threat, breaks into her cell and attacks her, apparently killing her. At the same moment another version of Sharon awakens in the cockpit of a Raptor, only to discover that she is under attack by several free-floating humans in space suits.
